body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks for the great work! I successfully built pytorch on my windows box using your new_version branch. I wanted to use MKL instead of OpenBLAS and the Ninja Generator instead of Visual Studio (parallel CUDA builds, yay!). I pushed the changes I made to https://github.com/willyd/pytorch/tree/ninja-mkl. I think some of the changes are required with OpenBLAS and VS so have a look if you want.

Side note, maybe build_all[.bat|.sh] would be better replaced with a CMakeLists.txt and ExternalProject_Add calls. That way the same script could be made to work with any OS.
